Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.data_spec

Class MemoryRegion

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.data_spec.MemoryRegion
public class MemoryRegion
extends java.lang.Object
A memory region storage object.

As memory regions are modifiable objects, their equality is defined in terms of their fundamental object identity.

    • setWritePointer

      public void setWritePointer​(int address)
      Set the write pointer. The write pointer is where the next block of data to be written will actually be written.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to set.
